code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PropertyDetail(){const{id}=useParams();const[property,setProperty]=useState(null);const[showContact,setShowContact]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{fetch(`http://localhost:5000/api/properties/${id}`).then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setProperty(data));},[id]);if(!property)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"max-w-4xl mx-auto p-4",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-2xl font-bold mb-2",children:property.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:property.image,alt:property.title,className:"w-full h-96 object-cover rounded mb-4"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-lg mb-1",children:["\uD83D\uDCCD ",property.city]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-green-600 font-bold text-xl mb-3",children:["\u20B9 ",property.price.toLocaleString()]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mb-4",children:property.description}),!showContact?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>setShowContact(true),className:"bg-blue-600 text-white px-4 py-2 rounded",children:"\uD83D\uDCDE Contact Seller"}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"bg-gray-100 p-4 rounded mt-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Phone:"})," ",property.contact]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Email:"})," ",property.email||"Not Provided"]})]})]});}export default PropertyDetail;
